bibdata.title: IEEE Guide for the Functional Specification of Medium Voltage (1- 35kV) Electronic Series Devices for Compensation of Voltage Fluctuations
IEEE Guide for the Functional Specification of Medium Voltage (1- 35kV) Electronic Series Devices for Compensation of Voltage Fluctuations

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: An approach to prepare a specification for an electronic device connected in series to compensate voltage fluctuations is presented.This guide intends to provide a base specification to allow users to modify specific parts of the document to meet their practical needs.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
